p: Orally took Ximenia americana as fresh or processed form also works well for treating skin wounds, hemorrhoids, and helps with looseness of the bowels. In addition, it is a decent pain-relieving agent that lowers fevers; at the same time, it additionally works well to fight off viral infections such as measles [ 29]. Some of the compounds in this plant help with insulin-resistant diabetes, and for treating Alzheimer's disease, improving memory, and lowering cholesterol.
